title: >>> Happily Ever AFTER?
body_text:
A Knight's Tale ... Continued?
Seems like every fairy tale has its glorious ending - the good, the "chosen" if you will, overcome the forces of evil. But truth be told, does the "evil" really vanish?
Team WALL
A fearless, gutsy, resilient army united by a common bond. The
Knights
, comprised of some of the most decorated soldiers to ever set foot on the battlegrounds, have the chance to recreate the events thats transpired nearly one month ago.
--
Biggest Threats
: Kevin Fitzpatrick, Justin Pierce, Alison Bertsch, the Adams Brothers, Melissa Kerr
Team ALL
A resourceful group of misfits connected by a single purpose. They have the desire and they damn sure have the numbers. Could this be the fairy tale ending they have envisioned?
--
Biggest Threats
: Mike Edwards, Kevin Megill, John Tronolone, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Mike Butler
No excuses, no nonsense.
The anxiously awaited
WALL v. ALL
rematch has arrived.
And it can only happen at DODGEBALL 97.
For the history on the first encounter, check out
DODGEBALL 93
.

Seems like every fairy tale has its glorious ending - the good, the "chosen" if you will, overcome the forces of evil. But truth be told, does the "evil" really vanish?
